A 3 day multi-sport BUILD-YOUR-OWN adventure challenge taking you on a statewide roadtrip to experience all outdoor sports at varying levels. Participants receive a list of over 500 epic outdoor challenges to choose from to build their own adventure with their teammates. Each task is assigned a point value and participants log task completion via an awesome adventure app. The photos are epic and no adventure is ever the same! UPCOMING EVENTS: Colorado July 14-16Utah SeptNew Mexico OctArizona Nov

AMG has evolved over the past 7 years from a client-facing agency that served small to mid-size businesses to now specializing in technical fulfillment to larger marketing agencies. We have offered a wide variety of digital marketing services including:* Digital Development: ranging from Wordpress to .NET dev*  Front-end Design* Systems Integration (Magento, Hubspot, CXT, Ecommerce solutions, etc)* Custom Development work * SEO & PPC* Social Media Management* Blog Dev & ManagementAMG currently works primarily with mid to large marketing & PR agencies, local & national, to assist in growing or sustaining their digital dev capabilities. We are able to efficiently join in-house agency teams and compliment their team by adding our dev knowledge, strategy, execution & QA.
Nonprofit founded to provide Emotional, Educational & Financial Resources to Patients & their caregivers living with CFIDS/CFS everyday. CFIDS = Chronic Fatigue Immune Dysfunction Syndrome

Responsible for connecting 2 Networking For Change chapters with a combined total of over 60 members with local charities to benefit. Each month, a new charity is chosen that our members will donate to in a variety of ways. Quarterly events are also held that have been a great networking opportunity for people of all industries, and a great time while raising money for one of our causes close to heart.
B&G Club of Phoenix- Metro Org
Plan, Fundraise, Promote and Execute events to benefit the causes and kids behind B&G Club in Metro Phx.Also serve as a Non-Profit Mentor to board newbies or board members in training.

Professional Speaker
March 5, 2012, Bella was a client of Lindsey’s

Working with Lindsey is like working with butter. It is SMOOTH!  Here is what I mean... Being able to send my pet sitting business clients to Lindsey so she can teach them how to gain more leads online and be more engaging with their website and social media has been a God send. Of course, I know how to do it, but there is a difference between knowing how and then sending my clients (who I hold very near and dear) to a true expert in the field who eats, sleeps, and breaths her industry. Aquarian Media has been able to create specific website designs for the pet sitting industry in an incredibly timely manor. In the past I have worked with companies who have taken forever to get back to me, return with something completely opposite of what I was looking for and who have taken months to complete a project. This isn't true with Lindsey. Her team is so fast, talented, and timely that I know when I contract their work it is one company that doesn't need babysitting. Thanks so much Lindsey for giving me the peace of mind that I can proudly shout your business name from the rooftops! :)

Aquarian Media Group has been a fantastic resource for my company Brandables.  Lindsey and her team have been so helpful in trying to get us "up to date" on social media and eventually redoing our website. I love to refer business to AMG as I know each company will be treated with the same amount of personal attention we have.  AMG stands out from the crowded arena because they do care about each and every one of their customers and will provide them with the personal service that other companies will only bill extra for.  I look forward to working with Lindsey and AMG in the future and making our online presence grow with their help.

Ken Scheer
Owner at Build Epic Consulting LLC
January 12, 2012, Lindsey worked with Ken but at different companies

I have known Ken for several years while he has been employed in different capacities at multiple companies. His passion and experience for the Gluten Free Food Market has always been on the forefront of his agenda. I couldn't be happier to see him make this into a business opportunity for not only the restaurants but the people seeking gluten free establishments. Because of his own experiences with food allergies, he not only has the medical background to guide people but the emotional support to help people through this journey. Coming from someone who has recently been diagnosed with food allergies, I am finding that sometimes the personal constraints this puts on your life can be harder than the physical side effects. Ken also has knowledge of the F&B industry which allows him to work cohesively with chefs and restaurant owners to develop gluten free options on their menu and to explain to them the cross-contamination issues that a lot of people face when eating out. Ken definitely has the knowledge, experience and passion to assist people with food allergies or restaurant owner/Chef with adjusting their menu. If you have any questions about this process, you should definitely talk to him.

summary: I've been lucky enough to experience life, business, friends and family to the highest degree. Through a variety of passions I have found my wheel house... Digital strategy, serving the nonprofit community and creating epic outdoor adventure for people to enjoyWORKWith marketing agency experience and client-side work under my belt I am able to bring a unique approach to marketing strategy and implementation. I thrive on strategic and tactical creativity while enthusiastically displaying campaign ROI through measurable statistics and enhancing UX. Loving what you do is cliche to say... but that passion drives the creative work force that I love. Being around diverse, strong, creative minds continues to motivate me to perform at my highest level. So a big thanks to all the fellow marketing nerds out there!
name: Lindsey Beres
title: Adventure Junkie, Tech Nerd & Non-Profit Founder
